name: Air and Space
description:
🎮Controls:

PC:

Press Q to thrust and E to reverse thrust.

Controller:

Press [X] to thrust and [B] to reverse thrust.

Phone:

Press the left side of the screen to thrust and press the left side of the screen to reverse thrust.

ℹ About:

A score is logged when you have been in a stable orbit for 10 seconds with no input.

What is your high score?

📝Updates:

0.1 - Added Controller, Phone Support, and ✨Points mode✨
